itunes:title: Shouldn't a 6-Year-Old Know Better?
title: Shouldn't a 6-Year-Old Know Better?
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: Janet answers a question about boundaries and lim…
itunes:summary:
Janet answers a question about boundaries and limit testing from the mother of a 6-year-old. Her husband believes certain behaviors are unacceptable because their boy is old enough “to know better,” but this mom disagrees and is looking for some clarity about realistic expectations for a child their son’s age. 

For more advice on common parenting issues, please check out Janet's best-selling books on audio at Audible (https://adbl.co/2OBVztZ).  Her exclusive audio series  "Sessions" is also available for download. This is a collection of recorded one-on-one consultations with parents discussing their most immediate and pressing concerns (SessionsAudio.com).

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
